description: Number of divisors of n of form 5k+1.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
mathematica: CoefficientList[ Series[ Together[ Sum[ x^n/(1 - x^(5n)), {n, 110}]], {x, 0, 110}], x] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jan 31 2011 *)
crossrefs: For numbers of divisors of n of form 5k+i (i=1, 2, 3, 4) see: this sequence, A001877, A001878, A001899.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
